LanguageData.ARA_Hive_Dear.label: Respect and love
LanguageData.ARA_Hive_Dear.description: Come a little closer, Messengers of the Sacred Insects, and let me enjoy your beauty to the fullest.
LanguageData.ARA_Hive_Honorable.label: fear
LanguageData.ARA_Hive_Honorable.description: A big, ugly and disgusting insect!
